page.title: 18 HOUSING
page.content: Many of the families in{Dalmilling {and Whitletts}district have lived here right from the time the houses were built over thirty years ago.Perhaps this is the reason why the people have strong feelings of{community spirit {and pride}in their home area. Variety of design and of building materials of the houses show the various stages of the community's development. Timber and prefabricated framed houses were erected three years after the Second World War.The later stages show the change to brick built semi_detatched villas and bungalows, houses with pebble_dash finish and finally, blocks of flats,three storeys high.Special smaller one bedroomed flats have been built for the elderly. For the past five years a programme of renovation and upgrading has given the area a new lease on life.
